detaileddescription.para: The flexible framework that highly simplify your work with the WPF. New controls, Auto building of an UI, Localization, Plugins managment and more!

listitem.para: The full documentation - allowed after download of the framework by the Documentation.lnk.

detaileddescription.para: You can find a relevant version of the framwork on the Releases page. Framwork not requires isntalation. Just store the downloaded source wherever you want and add the reference to the WpfHandler.csproj to your project.

para.heading: Why the product need your support?
